data.short_description: URLs with characters not present in the latin alphabet (or accented characters) crash the in-app browser
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a link that contains non-latin alphabet characters (this does not include accented latin characters)- Send the link in a message - Make sure you've set the in-app browser as your selected browser in settings - Tap on the link ( e.g.: http://www.uom.gr/orologia/informatics/ΤΕΠ-ΠΠΣ-ΩΠΔ-ΧΕ1617-8.pdf )
